name: Thunder Land
description:
Welcome to Thunder Land - a cool kid game!

Do you think you have the skills with Thunder Land - a cool kid game?

The rain season has begun! You should carry your umbrella with you all the time! Lily loves to be outside when it's raining. Today she wants to go shopping. Can you accompany her and give her some style tips? She would love your style!


Game features:

• Simple and easy to use!
• Great Graphics!
• Kids will love it and be entertained for ages!
• Cute and friendly design !
• Awesome Sounds and music!
• Beautiful graphics and characters!
• Catchy sounds and music!
• Easy game-play even for the smallest kids!
